# OLAP

## Wharehouse models

Commonly:

* Relations (tables);
* Stars and snowflakes (a slowflake occurs when there are "chains" of dimensions in a heirarchy e.g. sales (fact) -> store (dim) -> city(dim) -> region(dim)); and
* Cubes
